EmailTemplate.name: Customer Support:Entitlement:Partner Verification
EmailTemplate.subject: Partner Verification Required for Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
***CSR AGENT: Check this dashboard to see if the customer has been updated in the Partnership Program: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hO0m5dUHj1ypR1u3w1F759awQYdEWEnVlGt01v44QNY/edit#gid=1068916258 Check Open Activities in salesforce. If there is no information in either email amackenzie@pivotal.io and ceisner@pivotal.io, cc global csr, asking if the customer is in the process of becoming a partner. ***
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We received your request for support. It is our policy to confirm your partner contract/agreement with Sales before providing technical assistance. Please reply with information that identifies your agreement with Pivotal.
Thanks for your assistance,
